s: ^Hello Mrs. Lee! I'm so excited I ran into you!
^Hello Mrs. Lee! I'm doing well now that I ran into you!
^Well, it's true. It's always great to talk with you.
^It's true ...in fact maybe you could help me with something?

Chat2: ^ you are so kind. My aerobics class makes me feel good! Maybe sometime you can join me."

s: ^Well, I actually want to ask some questions about your classes.
^That's great to hear! I  am looking for some information about classes.

Explain1: ^Mrslee?Smiling "What is your question? I want to help."

s: ^Mr. Calindas's mother is moving to Bloomwood, and she needs great activities.
^Mr. Calindas's mother is moving here. Can we talk about aerobics class?

Explain2: ^Mrslee?Smiling "She is moving here? To live with Giancarlo? That is nice. She might join a class with me! Aerobic activity is very good for both mind and body."
^Mrslee?Smiling "I read that exercise fights depression. And dementia. Getting older is hard. Exercise helps."

s: ^What do you suggest as a first step?

Suggestion1: ^Mrslee_Day 2_The Community Center offers a variety of classes that might suit Mother Calindas_Mrcalindas2-1

Suggestion1.#: notification Mrslee_Day 2_The Community Center offers a variety of classes that might suit Mother Calindas_Mrcalindas2-1

Suggestion1: ^Mrslee?Smiling "Well, they say she needs to talk to doctor before starting new physical activity. I guess Giancarlo knows that already."
^Mrslee?Smiling "Maybe Giancarlo can bring her here. We can help pick the right class for her comfort. Swimming, aerobics, tai chi. The Community Center offers a little of everything."

s: ^That sounds great! What about the social benefits?

Suggestion2: ^Mrslee_Day 2_Group exercise classes offer social, physical, and mental benefits_Mrcalindas2-2

Suggestion2.#: notification Mrslee_Day 2_Group exercise classes offer social, physical, and mental benefits_Mrcalindas2-2

Suggestion2: ^Mrslee?Smiling "Oh, yes! For elders, group exercise can be very social. I see many friends in my class."
^Mrslee?Smiling "When I lost Dr. Lee, Eddie felt a lot of stress. I think he worried that I would be all alone, and sad."
^Mrslee?Smiling "Exercise class gives me many good things. So many friends. So many reasons to wake up. I see happy faces every day."
^Mrslee?Smiling "I stay healthy, I have strength. It give me a feeling of independence! It helps me feel strong and my balance is good. I love it!"
Goodbye: ^. Tell me when she is here. I would love to meet her. Now I need to get ready to volunteer with Lila today. See you!"

s: ^Goodbye, Mrs. Lee. Have a wonderful day!
^Goodbye, Mrs. Lee, have a great time with Lila and the kiddos today!
